Written and Produced by: Craig Bodeker                           
Associate Producer: Hans Damkoehler                              
                                                                
In his groundbreaking new documentary; A Conversation About Race,
filmmaker Craig Bodeker redefines the conventional wisdom on Race
and Racism.                                                      

If you have problems playing on standalone players download MPEG4
Modifier from moitah.net and remove (Unpack) Packed Bitstream and
save.                                                            
                                                                
Video is like this on source, I tried to crop it best I could, no
IVTC needed.                                                     
                                                                
This is very good documentary, everyone should watch it to better
understand race issues particularly in USA, but also  rest of the
world. Feel free to SPREAD it and of course buy original copy and
support authors if you can.
